root.name: % (modulo)

example.code: int a = 20%100; // Sets a to 20 int b = 20%100; // Sets b to 20 float c = 75.0%100.0; // Sets c to 75.0 float d = 275.0%100.0; // Sets d to 75.0

root.description: Calculates the remainder when one number is divided by another. It is extremely useful for keeping numbers within a boundary such as keeping a shape on the screen.
